Dessert Selection

Dessert Selection

Navigation
Dining Reservations Dessert Wine List Nitrotini Private Dining Request Information 
Grill 225 Philosophy

The "Truth in Beef" is about our commitment to serving our guests the absolute best Prime Beef. This means that each beef cut has been verified 100% to be of USDA Prime quality, and aged to our exacting standards. Our proprietary aging process yields a minimum aging cycle of 42 days on all beef cuts, with the exception of our center cut New York strip, which is aged 50 days.

A Fitting Finale

Fine food deserves an ovation, so we believe dessert is a course all its own. Grill 225's Executive Pastry Chef Gerry Elliot has overseen the Hotel's confections since the beginning, and he has designed Charleston's most extensive menu of divine desserts.
His signature creations include Baked Carolina - a popular dessert that is flambéed table-side and served family-style - and Banana Bread Pudding served warm with caramel sauce and caramel ice cream. The dessert course is thoughtfully prepared and artistically presented, a fitting finale to a masterful meal.

Reserve a Table 
Experience the Difference in 42-50 day aged Prime Steaks.

Welcome to Grill 225, Charleston's first and only 100% USDA Prime steak house. Located at the luxurious Market Pavilion Hotel in the heart of historic Charleston, we offer a dining experience like no other.

Premier Prime Steakhouse

As Charleston's premier steakhouse, our menu is one of the few in the country that features 100% USDA Prime Beef. All of our beef selections, including the filet mignon, are hand-selected and wet-aged 42 -50 days to ensure tender texture and unsurpassed flavor.
Private Event 
Fresh Seafood

At Grill 225 we place a great deal of emphasis on seafood harvested from both local and International waters. Using only premium ingredients such as local sustainable seafood as well as exclusive premium domestic and international offerings.

Nitrotini

Nitrotini is Charleston's only cocktail infused with liquid nitrogen. Dramatic, sexy and delicious, the Nitrotini is possibly the coldest and most refreshing cocktail you have ever tasted. Our expert staff is specially trained in the art, science and safety of the Nitrotini.
Experience Nitrotini Hotel Reservations Grill 225 Reservations Information Request Events

Grill 225 Philosophy

The "Truth in Beef" is about our commitment to serving our guests the absolute best Prime Beef. This means that each beef cut has been verified 100% to be of USDA Prime quality, and aged to our exacting standards. Our proprietary aging process yields a minimum aging cycle of 42 days on all beef cuts, with the exception of our center cut New York strip, which is aged 50 days.

cla

Wine List

A magnificent meal deserves the perfect wine. Grill 225's 100% USDA Prime Beef, wet-aged to perfection, awaits a lush, round red vintage. Delicate seafood flavors stand out when complemented by just the right white varietal. Some nights simply call for Champagne. At Grill 225, choose from over 350 bottles of everything from a classic Cabernet Sauvignon to a cult California selection. Balanced but imaginative, bold yet refined, our wine list reflects major varietals and regions from around the world.

Events and Meetings 
Plan the Very Best
Contact 
Get in Touch
Request Information 
How may we be of service?

Your next social gathering or corporate event deserves the very best, which is just what you'll find at the Market Pavilion Hotel. As a venue, we offer a one-of-a-kind, historic Charleston setting. As a top hotel with two world-class restaurants, Grill 225 and the Pavilion Bar, we ensure a pristine experience and the finest cuisine for your guests. .

Special Occasions

Of course you want your guests to eat, drink and be merry, so host your next special occasion at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Perfect for intimate showers, sophisticated luncheons, cocktail receptions, or lavish weddings, we have the indoor or outdoor venue that's just right for you.

Corporate Events

Host your next meeting or corporate event with the latest advanced technology and a sense of style at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Want to make it memorable? Let us customize it for you with creative ideas to energize and surprise your guests with all that is bespoke Charleston.

Private Event Dining

The private and semi-private areas of Market Pavilion Hotel, Grill 225, and the Pavilion atop the Market Pavilion Hotel are the perfect place to celebrate all of life's happy occassions, from an engagement party to an unforgettable 50th anniversary soiree.

Infinite Celebrations

The Pavilion Bar is a rooftop must-do, complete with views of historic Charleston, a cascading pool, signature cocktails, eclectic cuisine offerings and the city's most spectacular sunsets. The Pavilion Bar maintains a sophisticated and stylish atmosphere for its guests. 
 Opens daily at Noon.

Cheers

Truly the lap of luxury, retreat to Charleston's only rooftop cascading pool. Sip on one of our signature cocktails, or enjoy a selection from our extensive champagne menu or wine list.
View our Drink Menu 
Savor

Enjoy the casual but superb fare from the Pavilion Bar. It features only the finest 100% USDA Prime Beef and freshest seafood, as well as an eclectic assortment of inspired local salads, flatbreads, shareable bites, and curated cocktails.
View our Food Menu 
VIP Tables

Enjoy a private table reservation that includes an array of amenities such as: beverages from our renowned wine, cocktail and champagne menus as well as cuisine from the Pavilion Bar menu.

cla

Celebrate

The private and semi-private dining rooms are the perfect place to celebrate all of life's happy occasions, from an engagement party to an unforgettable 50th anniversary soiree.

Corporate Events

Exceed Expectations. The most effective corporate events do not feel like business at all. We have staff specially and specifically trained to help you plan and deliver a successful corporate dinner with ease.
We have a proven track record of success with our corporate clients. Pharmaceutical dinners are one of our specialties, and we are proud that our events always exceed attendance goals set by our clients.
